name: cerb.reminder.remind.notification
script:
start:
  record.create:
    output: new_notification
    inputs:
      # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/records/types/notification/#records-api
      record_type: notification
      fields:
        worker_id: {{reminder_worker_id}}
        target__context: reminder
        target_id: {{reminder_id}}
        activity_point: custom.other
        params:
          message@raw: Reminder: {{reminder}}
          variables:
            reminder: {{reminder__label}}
          urls:
            reminder: ctx://{{reminder__context}}:{{reminder_id}}
